SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.components.minigames

Class BettingLogic

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.minigames.BettingLogic
public class BettingLogic extends Object
Handles all logic related to placing and resolving bets in a mini-game.

This class is independent of any UI components and manages the player's current bet, balance, and winnings based on game results. It interacts with the InventoryComponent to update the player's available funds.

  • Constructor Details

    • BettingLogic

      public BettingLogic(int multiplier, InventoryComponent inventory)
      Constructs a new BettingLogic instance.
      Parameters:
      multiplier - the payout multiplier applied when the player wins
      inventory - the player's InventoryComponent, used to get and update their balance

  • Method Details

    • getBalance

      public int getBalance()
      Returns the player's current balance.
      Returns:
      the available balance

    • getBet

      public int getBet()
      Returns the current bet amount.
      Returns:
      the active bet amount

    • placeBet

      public void placeBet(int amount)
      Places a bet of the given amount. Deducts the bet from the player's balance in their InventoryComponent.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to bet
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the bet is zero, negative, or exceeds the available balance

    • adjustBet

      public void adjustBet(int delta)
      Adjusts the current bet by the specified delta value.

      Ensures that the bet never becomes negative.

      Parameters:
      delta - the amount to increase or decrease the bet by

    • calculateWinnings

      public int calculateWinnings()
      Calculates the total winnings if the player wins, based on the bet and multiplier.
      Returns:
      the total winnings amount

    • onWin

      public void onWin()
      Handles the win condition by awarding winnings to the player's inventory and updating the balance accordingly.

    • onTie

      public void onTie()
      Handles the tie condition by refunding the player's bet.

    • onLose

      public void onLose()
      Handles the lose condition.

      The bet has already been deducted when placed, so no additional balance updates are needed.

    • doubleBet

      public void doubleBet()
      Doubles the current bet by subtracting the bet amount again from the player's inventory.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player does not have enough balance

    • canDouble

      public boolean canDouble()
      Checks if the player has enough balance to double their current bet.
      Returns:
      true if doubling is allowed, false otherwise

    • split

      public void split()
      Splits the current bet into a new bet of equal size.

      In this simplified logic, it simply places another bet of the same amount.

    • doubleWin

      public void doubleWin()
      Handles the double-win condition, awarding double winnings to the player's inventory.

    • doubleTie

      public void doubleTie()
      Handles the double-tie condition, refunding double the bet amount to the player.
